'''Compound Interest''' is [[Dori]]'s [[4th Ascension Passive]].

==Gameplay Notes==
*The energy gain from the passive is linear to Energy Recharge, and not stepwise at every 100%. So the difference between having 298% ER and 302% ER is insignificant.
